title: Multiplying the Determinant with the Changed Matrix
text: We must modify the matrix into the form $$\begin{bmatrix} d & -b \\ -c & a \end{bmatrix}$$. We now have $$\begin{bmatrix} \frac{-1}{2} & \frac{-3}{2} \\ -1 & \frac{1}{2} \end{bmatrix}$$. Dividing this by the determinant gives us $$(-4/7)\begin{bmatrix} \frac{-1}{2} & \frac{-3}{2} \\ -1 & \frac{1}{2} \end{bmatrix}$$
